title: Poster, 2010-21-101, 1970
medium: Offset lithograph on wove paper, mounted on linen
provenance: Acquired from dealers, galleries and auction houses by Marc Benda.  Remained with Benda until 2010, when gifted to CHNDM.
creditline: Gift of Sara and Marc Benda
description: On crème background, a black-and-white photograph of a man's face, toned blue, with the hair toned in the crème color of the background. In the margins around the face, the inscriptions: at left, top to bottom- "Sensacyjny pojedynek / gangsterow / w amerykanskim filmie", "w rolach glownych Angie Dickinson  Keenan Wynn  Carroll O'Connor / Lee Marvin"; at right, top to bottom- "zbieg v Alcatraz / rezyseria John Boorman / Produkcja MGM".
